com.icodici.universa.contract.roles

Class ListRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icodici.universa.contract.roles.Role
      • com.icodici.universa.contract.roles.ListRole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.sergeych.biserializer.BiSerializable

    public class ListRole
extends Role
    Role combining other roles (sub-roles) in the "and", "or" and "any N of" principle.

      • ListRole

        public ListRole(java.lang.String name,
                ListRole.Mode mode,
                @NonNull java.util.Collection<Role> roles)
        Create new role combining other roles (sub-roles)
        Parameters:
        name - is role name
        mode - is mode of sub-roles combining: "and", "or" and "any N of" principle
        roles - is collection of sub-roles

        Parameters:
        name - is role name
        quorumSize - is N in "any N of" principle
        roles - is collection of sub-roles

      • setQuorum

        public void setQuorum(int n)
        Set mode to ListRole.Mode.QUORUM and quorum size to any n roles.
        Parameters:
        n - how many subroles set of key must be able to play to play this role

      • getQuorum

        public int getQuorum()
        Returns:
        quorum size if in quorum mode, otherwise 0

      • setMode

        public void setMode(ListRole.Mode newMode)
        Set mode to either ListRole.Mode.ALL or ListRole.Mode.ANY, Quorum mode could be set only with setQuorum(int) call,
        Parameters:
        newMode - mode to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if mode other than ANY/ALL is specified
